00094 // 
00096 BOOL cvt_V1190_open( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 base_address, long vme_handle, CVT_V1X90_TYPES type)
00097 {
00098         memset( p_data, 0, sizeof( cvt_V1190_data));
00099         // Check board type
00100         switch( type)
00101         {
00102         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00103         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00104         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00105         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00106                 break;
00107         default:
00108                 TRACE1( "cvt_V1190_open: bad board type: %d\n", type);
00109                 return FALSE;
00110         }
00111         // basic data initialization
00112         if( !cvt_board_open( &p_data->m_common_data, base_address, vme_handle, CVT_V1190_REG_TABLE))
00113                 return FALSE;
00114         // board specific data initialization
00115         p_data->m_common_data.set_MCST_CBLT= ( BOOL (*)( void*, UINT8, MCST_CBLT_board_pos))cvt_V1190_set_MCST_CBLT;
00116         p_data->m_type= type;
00117 
00118 #ifdef CVT_V1190_USE_DATA_QUEUE
00119         p_data->m_queue= malloc( CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD* sizeof( UINT32));  
00120         if( p_data->m_queue== NULL)
00121         {
00122                 TRACE( "cvt_V1190_open: cannot allocate queue buffer\n");
00123                 return FALSE;
00124         }
00125         memset( p_data->m_queue, 0, CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD* sizeof( UINT32));
00126 #endif
00127         
00128         return TRUE;
00129 }
00130 
00132 // 
00134 BOOL cvt_V1190_close( cvt_V1190_data* p_data)
00135 {
00136 #ifdef CVT_V1190_USE_DATA_QUEUE
00137         if( p_data->m_queue!= NULL)
00138         {
00139                 free( p_data->m_queue);
00140         }
00141 #endif
00142         if( !cvt_board_close( &p_data->m_common_data))
00143                 return FALSE;
00144         return TRUE;
00145 }

00159 // 
00161 BOOL cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 ope_code, const UINT16* p_params, int num_params)
00162 {
00163         UINT16 micro_hnd= 0;
00164         // wait for micro register write ok
00165         do
00166         {
00167                 if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_INDEX, &micro_hnd))
00168                 {
00169                         return FALSE;
00170                 }
00171         } while( !(micro_hnd& CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_WRITEOK_MSK));
00172         // write opcode to micro register
00173         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_INDEX, &ope_code))
00174         {
00175                 return FALSE;
00176         }
00177         // write ope cod
00178         while( num_params--)
00179         {
00180                 // wait for micro register write ok
00181                 do
00182                 {
00183                         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_INDEX, &micro_hnd))
00184                         {
00185                                 return FALSE;
00186                         }
00187                 } while( !(micro_hnd& CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_WRITEOK_MSK));
00188                 if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_INDEX, p_params++))
00189                 {
00190                         return FALSE;
00191                 }
00192         }
00193         return TRUE;
00194 }
00195 
00197 // 
00199 BOOL cvt_V1190_read_from_micro( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 ope_code, UINT16* p_params, int num_params)
00200 {
00201         UINT16 micro_hnd= 0;
00202         // wait for micro register write ok
00203         do
00204         {
00205                 if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_INDEX, &micro_hnd))
00206                 {
00207                         return FALSE;
00208                 }
00209         } while( !(micro_hnd& CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_WRITEOK_MSK));
00210         // write opcode to micro register
00211         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_INDEX, &ope_code))
00212         {
00213                 return FALSE;
00214         }
00215         // read ope code 
00216         while( num_params--)
00217         {
00218                 // wait for micro register read ok
00219                 do
00220                 {
00221                         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_INDEX, &micro_hnd))
00222                         {
00223                                 return FALSE;
00224                         }
00225                 } while( !(micro_hnd& CVT_V1190_MICRO_HND_READOK_MSK));
00226                 if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MICRO_INDEX, p_params++))
00227                 {
00228                         return FALSE;
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         return TRUE;
00232 }
00233 
00235 // 
00237 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_bitmask_control( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_MSK value)
00238 {
00239         UINT16 reg_value= value;
00240         // set bitmask to register
00241         if( !cvt_set_bitmask( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_ADD, &reg_value, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_AM, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_DATA_SIZE))
00242         {
00243                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONTROL_SET failed !\n");
00244                 return FALSE;
00245         }
00246         return TRUE;
00247 }
00248 
00250 // 
00252 BOOL cvt_V1190_clear_bitmask_control( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_MSK value)
00253 {
00254         UINT16 reg_value= value;
00255         // set bitmask to register
00256         if( !cvt_clear_bitmask( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_ADD, &reg_value, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_AM, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_DATA_SIZE))
00257         {
00258                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONTROL_CLEAR failed !\n");
00259                 return FALSE;
00260         }
00261         return TRUE;
00262 }

00271 // 
00273 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_windows_width( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 value)
00274 {
00275         UINT16 reg_value= (UINT16)value;
00276         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_WIN_WIDTH_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00277         {
00278                 TRACE( "V1190 WND_WIDTH write failed !\n");
00279                 return FALSE;
00280         }
00281         return TRUE;
00282 }

00288 {

00290         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_WIN_OFFSET_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00291         {
00292                 TRACE( "V1190 WND_OFFSET write failed !\n");
00293                 return FALSE;

00299 // 
00301 BOOL cvt_V1190_get_channel_enable( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 *p_enable_msk)
00302 {
00303         int num_ch= 0;
00304 
00305         switch( p_data->m_type)
00306         {
00307         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00308                 num_ch= CVT_V1190_NUM_TDC_A* CVT_V1190_CH_PER_TDC;
00309                 break;
00310         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00311                 num_ch= CVT_V1190_NUM_TDC_B* CVT_V1190_CH_PER_TDC;
00312                 break;
00313         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00314                 num_ch= CVT_V1290_NUM_TDC_A* CVT_V1290_CH_PER_TDC;
00315                 break;
00316         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00317                 num_ch= CVT_V1290_NUM_TDC_N* CVT_V1290_CH_PER_TDC;
00318                 break;
00319         default:
00320                 TRACE1( "cvt_V1190_get_channel_enable: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00321                 return FALSE;
00322         }
00323         //
00324         // read channel enable pattern
00325         if( !cvt_V1190_read_from_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_READ_EN_PATTERN_OPCODE, p_enable_msk, num_ch>> 4))
00326         {
00327                 TRACE( "V1190 EN_CHANNEL_MSK write failed !\n");
00328                 return FALSE;
00329         }
00330 
00331         return TRUE;
00332 }

00342                 return FALSE;
00343         }
00344         return TRUE;
00345 }

00374 // 
00376 BOOL cvt_V1190_read_MEB( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, void* p_buff, UINT32* p_buff_size)
00377 {
00378         BOOL is_berr= FALSE;
00379         if( !cvt_FIFO_BLT_read( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_OUT_BUFFER_ADD, p_buff, *p_buff_size, p_buff_size, CVT_V1190_OUT_BUFFER_AM, CVT_V1190_OUT_BUFFER_DATA_SIZE, &is_berr))
00380         {
00381                 return FALSE;
00382         }
00383         // V1190 return a filler if output buffer empty, so discard it
00384         if( *p_buff_size== sizeof( UINT32))
00385         {
00386                 if( CVT_V1190_IS_FILLER( *((UINT32*)p_buff)))
00387                         *p_buff_size= 0;
00388         }
00389         return TRUE;
00390 }
00391 
00393 // 
00395 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_continuous_acquisition_mode( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, CVT_V1190_EDGE_DETECTION_ENUM edge_detection, CVT_V1190_PAIR_RES_WIDTH_ENUM res_width, const UINT16 *p_enable_msk)
00396 {
00397         UINT16 reg_value;
00398         //
00399         // write continuous storage mode opcode
00400         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_CONT_STORE_OPCODE, NULL, 0))
00401         {
00402                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONT_STORE_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00403                 return FALSE;
00404         }
00405 
00406         //
00407         // Edge detection
00408         switch( edge_detection)
00409         {
00410         case CVT_V1190_ED_PAIR_MODE:                    
00411                 switch( p_data->m_type)
00412                 {
00413                 case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00414                 case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00415                         break;
00416                 case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00417                 case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00418                         // Pair Mode is not valid for V1290X 
00419                         TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_continuous_acquisition_mode bad edge detection type '%d' for V1290X !\n", edge_detection);
00420                         return FALSE;
00421                 }
00422         case CVT_V1190_ED_TRAILING_ONLY:                
00423         case CVT_V1190_ED_LEADING_ONLY:                 
00424         case CVT_V1190_ED_TRAILING_AND_LEADING: 
00425                 break;
00426         default:
00427                 TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_continuous_acquisition_mode bad edge detection type '%d' !\n", edge_detection);
00428                 return FALSE;
00429         }
00430         reg_value= edge_detection;      
00431         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_DETECTION_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00432         {
00433                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_DETECTION_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00434                 return FALSE;
00435         }
00436 
00437         // 
00438         // Resolution width
00439         switch( p_data->m_type)
00440         {
00441         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00442         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00443                 {
00444                         switch( res_width)
00445                         {
00446                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_100PS:                       
00447                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_200PS:                       
00448                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_400PS:                       
00449                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_800PS:                       
00450                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_1_6NS:                       
00451                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_3_12NS:                      
00452                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_6_25NS:                      
00453                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_12_5NS:                      
00454                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_25NS:                        
00455                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_50NS:                        
00456                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_100NS:                       
00457                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_200NS:                       
00458                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_400NS:                       
00459                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_800NS:                       
00460                                 break;
00461                         default:
00462                                 TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_continuous_acquisition_mode bad resolution width '%d' !\n", res_width);
00463                                 return FALSE;
00464                         }
00465                         reg_value= 0;
00466                         CVT_V1190_SET_PAIR_RES_WITH( reg_value, res_width);
00467                         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_PAIR_RES_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00468                         {
00469                                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_PAIR_RES_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00470                                 return FALSE;
00471                         }
00472                 }
00473         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00474         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00475                 break;  
00476         }
00477         //
00478         // Channel enable mask
00479         if( p_enable_msk)
00480         {
00481                 if( !cvt_V1190_set_channel_enable( p_data, p_enable_msk))
00482                 {
00483                         return FALSE;
00484                 }
00485         }
00486 
00487         return TRUE;
00488 }
00489 
00491 // 
00493 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_trigger_matching_acquisition_mode( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, INT16 window_width, INT16 window_offset, INT16 extra_search_margin, INT16 reject_margin, CVT_V1190_EDGE_DETECTION_ENUM edge_detection, CVT_V1190_PAIR_RES_WIDTH_ENUM res_width, const UINT16 *p_enable_msk, BOOL header_trailer_enable, BOOL empty_event_enable, BOOL trigger_time_tag_enable)
00494 {
00495         UINT16 reg_value;
00496         UINT16 set_msk= 0;
00497         UINT16 clear_msk= 0;
00498         //
00499         // set trigger matching mode
00500         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_TRG_MATCH_OPCODE, NULL, 0))
00501         {
00502                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_TRG_MATCH_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00503                 return FALSE;
00504         }
00505         //
00506         // Set window width
00507         if( window_width>= 0)
00508         {
00509                 if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_WIN_WIDTH_OPCODE, ( UINT16*)&window_width, 1))
00510                 {
00511                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_WIN_WIDTH_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00512                         return FALSE;
00513                 }
00514         }
00515         //
00516         // Set window offset
00517         if( window_offset>= 0)
00518         {
00519                 if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_WIN_OFFSET_OPCODE, ( UINT16*)&window_offset, 1))
00520                 {
00521                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_WIN_OFFSET_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00522                         return FALSE;
00523                 }
00524         }
00525         //
00526         // Set extra search margin micro opcode
00527         if( extra_search_margin>= 0)
00528         {
00529                 if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_SW_MARGIN_OPCODE, ( UINT16*)&extra_search_margin, 1))
00530                 {
00531                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_SW_MARGIN_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00532                         return FALSE;
00533                 }
00534         }
00535         //
00536         // Set reject margin micro opcode 
00537         if( reject_margin>= 0)
00538         {
00539                 if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_REJ_MARGIN_OPCODE, ( UINT16*)&reject_margin, 1))
00540                 {
00541                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_REJ_MARGIN_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00542                         return FALSE;
00543                 }
00544         }
00545         //
00546         // Edge detection
00547         switch( edge_detection)
00548         {
00549         case CVT_V1190_ED_PAIR_MODE:                    
00550                 switch( p_data->m_type)
00551                 {
00552                 case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00553                 case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00554                         break;
00555                 case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00556                 case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00557                         // Pair Mode is not valid for V1290X 
00558                         TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_trigger_matching_acquisition_mode bad edge detection type '%d' for V1290X !\n", edge_detection);
00559                         return FALSE;
00560                 }
00561         case CVT_V1190_ED_TRAILING_ONLY:                
00562         case CVT_V1190_ED_LEADING_ONLY:                 
00563         case CVT_V1190_ED_TRAILING_AND_LEADING: 
00564                 break;
00565         default:
00566                 TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_trigger_matching_acquisition_mode bad edge detection type '%d' !\n", edge_detection);
00567                 return FALSE;
00568         }
00569         reg_value= edge_detection;      
00570         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_DETECTION_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00571         {
00572                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_DETECTION_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00573                 return FALSE;
00574         }
00575         // 
00576         // Resolution width
00577         switch( p_data->m_type)
00578         {
00579         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00580         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00581                 {
00582                         switch( res_width)
00583                         {
00584                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_100PS:                       
00585                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_200PS:                       
00586                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_400PS:                       
00587                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_800PS:                       
00588                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_1_6NS:                       
00589                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_3_12NS:                      
00590                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_6_25NS:                      
00591                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_12_5NS:                      
00592                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_25NS:                        
00593                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_50NS:                        
00594                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_100NS:                       
00595                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_200NS:                       
00596                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_400NS:                       
00597                         case CVT_V1190_PRW_800NS:                       
00598                                 break;
00599                         default:
00600                                 TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_trigger_matching_acquisition_mode bad resolution width '%d' !\n", res_width);
00601                                 return FALSE;
00602                         }
00603                         reg_value= 0;
00604                         CVT_V1190_SET_PAIR_RES_WITH( reg_value, res_width);
00605                         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_SET_PAIR_RES_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00606                         {
00607                                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_SET_PAIR_RES_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00608                                 return FALSE;
00609                         }
00610                 }
00611         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00612         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00613                 break;  
00614         }
00615 
00616         //
00617         // Channel enable pattern
00618         //
00619         // Channel enable mask
00620         if( p_enable_msk)
00621         {
00622                 if( !cvt_V1190_set_channel_enable( p_data, p_enable_msk))
00623                 {
00624                         return FALSE;
00625                 }
00626         }
00627         //
00628         // enable/disable header trailer
00629         if( header_trailer_enable)
00630         {
00631                 if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_EN_HEAD_TRAILER_OPCODE, NULL, 0))
00632                 {
00633                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_EN_HEAD_TRAILER_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00634                         return FALSE;
00635                 }
00636         }
00637         else
00638         {
00639                 if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_DIS_HEAD_TRAILER_OPCODE, NULL, 0))
00640                 {
00641                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_DIS_HEAD_TRAILER_OPCODE write failed !\n");
00642                         return FALSE;
00643                 }
00644         }
00645 
00646         //
00647         // Empty event enable
00648         set_msk|= ( empty_event_enable)? CVT_V1190_CTRL_EMPTY_EVENT_MSK: 0;
00649         clear_msk|= ( empty_event_enable)? 0: CVT_V1190_CTRL_EMPTY_EVENT_MSK;
00650         //
00651         // Trigger time tag enable
00652         set_msk|= ( trigger_time_tag_enable)? CVT_V1190_CTRL_TRIGGER_TIME_TAG_ENABLE_MSK: 0;
00653         clear_msk|= ( trigger_time_tag_enable)? 0: CVT_V1190_CTRL_TRIGGER_TIME_TAG_ENABLE_MSK;
00654 
00655         if( set_msk)
00656         {
00657                 if( !cvt_set_bitmask_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_INDEX, &set_msk))
00658                 {
00659                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONTROL bitmask set failed !\n");
00660                         return FALSE;
00661                 }
00662         }
00663         if( clear_msk)
00664         {
00665                 if( !cvt_clear_bitmask_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_INDEX, &clear_msk))
00666                 {
00667                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONTROL bitmask clear failed !\n");
00668                         return FALSE;
00669                 }
00670         }
00671 
00672         return TRUE;
00673 }
00674 
00676 //
00678 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_interrupt( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT8 level, UINT8 vector)
00679 {
00680         UINT16 reg_value;
00681         //
00682         // interrupt level
00683         reg_value= level& 0x07;
00684         if( level!= reg_value)
00685         {
00686                 TRACE( "V1190 bad interrupt level !\n");
00687                 return FALSE;
00688         }
00689         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_INT_LEVEL_INDEX, &reg_value))
00690         {
00691                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_INT_LEVEL write failed !\n");
00692                 return FALSE;
00693         }
00694         //
00695         // interrupt vector
00696         reg_value= vector;
00697         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_INT_VECTOR_INDEX, &reg_value))
00698         {
00699                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_INT_VECTOR write failed !\n");
00700                 return FALSE;
00701         }
00702 
00703         return TRUE;
00704 }
00705 
00707 //
00709 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_readout_mode( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, BOOL bus_error_enable, BOOL align64_enable, UINT8 blt_event_number)
00710 {
00711         UINT16 reg_value;
00712         UINT16 set_msk= 0;
00713         UINT16 clear_msk= 0;
00714         
00715         //
00716         // Bus error
00717         set_msk|= ( bus_error_enable)? CVT_V1190_CTRL_BERR_ENABLE_MSK: 0;
00718         clear_msk|= ( bus_error_enable)? 0: CVT_V1190_CTRL_BERR_ENABLE_MSK;
00719         //
00720         // Align 64
00721         set_msk|= ( align64_enable)? CVT_V1190_CTRL_ALIGN64_MSK: 0;
00722         clear_msk|= ( align64_enable)? 0: CVT_V1190_CTRL_ALIGN64_MSK;
00723         
00724         //
00725         // bitmask set
00726         if( set_msk)
00727         {
00728                 if( !cvt_set_bitmask_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_INDEX, &set_msk))
00729                 {
00730                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONTROL write failed !\n");
00731                         return FALSE;
00732                 }
00733         }
00734         //
00735         // bitmask clear
00736         if( clear_msk)
00737         {
00738                 // clear the enable bit
00739                 if( !cvt_clear_bitmask_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_CONTROL_INDEX, &clear_msk))
00740                 {
00741                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_CONTROL write failed !\n");
00742                         return FALSE;
00743                 }
00744         }
00745 
00746         //
00747         // BLT event number
00748         reg_value= blt_event_number;
00749         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_BLT_EVENT_NUM_INDEX, &reg_value))
00750         {
00751                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_BLT_EVENT_NUM write failed !\n");
00752                 return FALSE;
00753         }
00754 
00755         return TRUE;
00756 }
00757 
00759 //
00761 BOOL cvt_V1190_get_status( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, BOOL *p_is_data_ready, BOOL *p_is_term_on, BOOL *p_is_buffer_full, BOOL *p_is_buffer_almost_full, CVT_V1190_STATUS_RES* p_resolution, UINT8* p_error_bitmask)
00762 {
00763         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00764         //
00765         // read status register
00766         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_STATUS_INDEX, &reg_value))
00767         {
00768                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_STATUS read failed !\n");
00769                 return FALSE;
00770         }
00771         *p_is_data_ready= ( reg_value& CVT_V1190_STS_DREADY_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
00772         *p_is_term_on= ( reg_value& CVT_V1190_STS_TERM_ON_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
00773         *p_is_buffer_full= ( reg_value& CVT_V1190_STS_FULL_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
00774         *p_is_buffer_almost_full= ( reg_value& CVT_V1190_STS_ALMOST_FULL_MSK)? TRUE: FALSE;
00775 
00776         *p_resolution= CVT_V1190_GET_STATUS_RES( reg_value);
00777         *p_error_bitmask= CVT_V1190_GET_STATUS_ERROR( reg_value);
00778 
00779         return TRUE;
00780 }
00781 
00783 //
00785 BOOL cvt_V1190_get_event_counter( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT32* p_counter)
00786 {
00787         UINT32 reg_value;
00788         *p_counter= 0;
00789         // Event Counter
00790         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_EVENT_COUNTER_INDEX, &reg_value))
00791         {
00792                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_EVENT_COUNTER read failed !\n");
00793                 return FALSE;
00794         }
00795         *p_counter= reg_value;
00796 
00797         return TRUE;
00798 }
00799 
00801 //
00803 BOOL cvt_V1190_get_event_stored( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16* p_counter)
00804 {
00805         UINT16 reg_value;
00806         *p_counter= 0;
00807         // Event stored
00808         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_EVENT_STORED_INDEX, &reg_value))
00809         {
00810                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_EVENT_STORED read failed !\n");
00811                 return FALSE;
00812         }
00813         *p_counter= reg_value;
00814 
00815         return TRUE;
00816 }
00817 
00818 
00820 //
00822 BOOL cvt_V1190_get_system_info( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 *p_firmware_rev, UINT32 *p_tdc_id_buff, UINT16 *p_micro_firmware_rev, UINT16 *p_serial_number)
00823 {
00824         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00825         UINT32 reg_value32= 0;
00826         int num_tdc= 0;
00827 
00828         switch( p_data->m_type)
00829         {
00830         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00831                 num_tdc= CVT_V1190_NUM_TDC_A;
00832                 break;
00833         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00834                 num_tdc= CVT_V1190_NUM_TDC_B;
00835                 break;
00836         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00837                 num_tdc= CVT_V1290_NUM_TDC_A;
00838                 break;
00839         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00840                 num_tdc= CVT_V1290_NUM_TDC_N;
00841                 break;
00842         default:
00843                 TRACE1( "cvt_V1190_get_system_info: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00844                 return FALSE;
00845         }
00846         //
00847         // Firmware revision register
00848         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_FW_REV_INDEX, &reg_value))
00849         {
00850                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_FW_REV read failed !\n");
00851                 return FALSE;
00852         }
00853         *p_firmware_rev= (( reg_value& 0x00f0)<< 4)|( reg_value& 0x000f);
00854         //
00855         // TDC IDs
00856         while( num_tdc--)
00857         {
00858                 if( !cvt_V1190_read_from_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_READ_TDC_ID_OPCODE+ num_tdc, (UINT16*)&reg_value32, 2))
00859                 {
00860                         TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_READ_TDC_ID_OPCODE opcode read failed !\n");
00861                         return FALSE;
00862                 }
00863                 p_tdc_id_buff[ num_tdc]= reg_value32;
00864                 // (( reg_value& 0x00f0)<< 4)|( reg_value& 0x000f);
00865         }
00866         //
00867         // Microcontroller firmware revision
00868         if( !cvt_V1190_read_from_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_READ_MICRO_REV_OPCODE, &reg_value, 1))
00869         {
00870                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_READ_MICRO_REV_OPCODE opcode read failed !\n");
00871                 return FALSE;
00872         }
00873         *p_micro_firmware_rev= (( reg_value& 0x00f0)<< 4)|( reg_value& 0x000f);
00874         //
00875         // Serial number
00876         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_ROM_SERIAL_0_INDEX, &reg_value))
00877         {
00878                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_ROM_SERIAL_LSB read failed !\n");
00879                 return FALSE;
00880         }
00881         *p_serial_number= reg_value& 0x00ff;
00882         if( !cvt_read_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_ROM_SERIAL_1_INDEX, &reg_value))
00883         {
00884                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_ROM_SERIAL_MSB read failed !\n");
00885                 return FALSE;
00886         }
00887         *p_serial_number|= (reg_value& 0x00ff)<< 8;
00888         return TRUE;
00889 }
00890 
00892 // 
00894 BOOL cvt_V1190_data_clear( cvt_V1190_data* p_data)
00895 {
00896         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00897         // force software clear
00898         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_SW_CLEAR_INDEX, &reg_value))
00899         {
00900                 TRACE( "V1190 SW_CLEAR write failed !\n");
00901                 return FALSE;
00902         }
00903         return TRUE;
00904 }
00905 
00907 // 
00909 BOOL cvt_V1190_module_reset( cvt_V1190_data* p_data)
00910 {
00911         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00912         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MOD_RESET_INDEX, &reg_value))
00913         {
00914                 TRACE( "V1190 MOD_RESET write failed !\n");
00915                 return FALSE;
00916         }
00917         return TRUE;
00918 }
00919 
00921 // 
00923 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_channel_enable( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, const UINT16* p_enable_msk)
00924 {
00925         int num_ch= 0;
00926 
00927         switch( p_data->m_type)
00928         {
00929         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_A:                                          
00930                 num_ch= CVT_V1190_NUM_TDC_A* CVT_V1190_CH_PER_TDC;
00931                 break;
00932         case CVT_V1190_TYPE_B:                                          
00933                 num_ch= CVT_V1190_NUM_TDC_B* CVT_V1190_CH_PER_TDC;
00934                 break;
00935         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_A:                                          
00936                 num_ch= CVT_V1290_NUM_TDC_A* CVT_V1290_CH_PER_TDC;
00937                 break;
00938         case CVT_V1290_TYPE_N:                                          
00939                 num_ch= CVT_V1290_NUM_TDC_N* CVT_V1290_CH_PER_TDC;
00940                 break;
00941         default:
00942                 TRACE1( "cvt_V1190_set_channel_enable: bad board type: %d\n", p_data->m_type);
00943                 return FALSE;
00944         }
00945 
00946         //
00947         // write channel enable pattern
00948         if( !cvt_V1190_write_2_micro( p_data, CVT_V1190_WRITE_EN_PATTERN_OPCODE, p_enable_msk, num_ch>> 4))
00949         {
00950                 TRACE( "V1190 EN_CHANNEL_MSK write failed !\n");
00951                 return FALSE;
00952         }
00953         return TRUE;
00954 }
00955 
00957 // 
00959 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_almost_full( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT16 almost_full_value)
00960 {
00961         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00962         //
00963         // write the almost full register
00964         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_ALMOST_FULL_LVL_INDEX, &reg_value))
00965         {
00966                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_ALMOST_FULL_LVL write failed !\n");
00967                 return FALSE;
00968         }
00969         return TRUE;
00970 }
00971 
00972 
00973 
00975 // 
00977 BOOL cvt_V1190_peek_event( cvt_V1190_data *p_data, UINT32 *out_buff, long *p_out_buff_size, UINT32 *p_event_count)
00978 {
00979         long in_org_pos= p_data->m_queue_ini;
00980         int step= 0;
00981         UINT32 data;
00982         long queue_ptr= in_org_pos;
00983         long out_buff_size= *p_out_buff_size;
00984         long num_word_to_read= 0;
00985 
00986         // scan input stream
00987         while( queue_ptr!= p_data->m_queue_end)
00988         {
00989                 data= p_data->m_queue[ queue_ptr];
00990                 if( ++queue_ptr>= CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
00991                 {
00992                         queue_ptr= 0;
00993                 }
00994                 switch( step)
00995                 {
00996                         case 0:
00997                                 //
00998                                 // wait for header
00999                                 if( !CVT_V1190_IS_GLOBAL_HEADER( data))
01000                                 {
01001                                         // misplaced data ?!?!?
01002                                         // skip it
01003                                         cvt_V1190_dequeue( p_data, NULL, 1);
01004                                         in_org_pos= queue_ptr;
01005                                         break;
01006                                 }
01007                                 // Global Header found:
01008                                 // EOB found
01009                                 // check event count
01010                                 *p_event_count= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_HDR_EVENT_COUNT( data);
01011 
01012                                 num_word_to_read= 1;
01013                                 ++step;
01014                                 break;
01015                         case 1:
01016                                 //
01017                                 // wait for EOB
01018                                 ++num_word_to_read;
01019                                 // check if EOB
01020                                 if( !CVT_V1190_IS_GLOBAL_TRAILER( data))
01021                                 {
01022                                         // channels data
01023                                         break;
01024                                 }
01025                                 if( out_buff_size< num_word_to_read)
01026                                 {
01027                                         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01028                                         return FALSE;
01029                                 }
01030                                 // event count matching
01031                                 if( queue_ptr>= in_org_pos)
01032                                 {
01033                                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ in_org_pos, num_word_to_read*sizeof( UINT32));
01034                                 }
01035                                 else
01036                                 {
01037                                         // HACK: debug < or <= condition
01038                                         long first_block_word= CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- in_org_pos;
01039                                         long second_block_word= num_word_to_read- first_block_word;
01040                                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ in_org_pos, first_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01041                                         memcpy( out_buff+ first_block_word, p_data->m_queue, second_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01042                                 }
01043                                 *p_out_buff_size= num_word_to_read;
01044                                 // done
01045                                 return TRUE;
01046                 }
01047         }
01048         *p_out_buff_size= 0;
01049         return FALSE;
01050 }
01051 
01053 // 
01055 BOOL cvt_V1190_inqueue( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, const UINT32* in_buff, UINT32 in_buff_size)
01056 {
01057         if( !in_buff_size)
01058                 return TRUE;
01059         if( cvt_V1190_get_queue_free( p_data)< (long)in_buff_size)
01060         {
01061                 // No enough free space
01062                 return FALSE;
01063         }
01064         if( p_data->m_queue_end+ in_buff_size< CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01065         {
01066                 memcpy( p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_end, in_buff, in_buff_size*sizeof( UINT32));
01067                 p_data->m_queue_end+= in_buff_size;
01068         }
01069         else
01070         {
01071                 long first_block_word= CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- p_data->m_queue_end;
01072                 long second_block_word= in_buff_size- first_block_word;
01073                 memcpy( p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_end, in_buff, first_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01074                 memcpy( p_data->m_queue, in_buff+ first_block_word, second_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01075                 p_data->m_queue_end= second_block_word;
01076         }
01077         return TRUE;
01078 }
01079 
01081 // 
01083 BOOL cvt_V1190_dequeue( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT32 *out_buff, UINT32 out_buff_size)
01084 {
01085         if( !out_buff_size)
01086                 return TRUE;
01087         if( cvt_V1190_get_queue_length( p_data)< (long)out_buff_size)
01088         {
01089                 // No enough data
01090                 return FALSE;
01091         }
01092         if( p_data->m_queue_ini+ out_buff_size< CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)
01093         {
01094                 if( out_buff)
01095                 {
01096                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_ini, out_buff_size*sizeof( UINT32));
01097                 }
01098                 p_data->m_queue_ini+= out_buff_size;
01099         }
01100         else
01101         {
01102                 long first_block_word= CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- p_data->m_queue_ini;
01103                 long second_block_word= out_buff_size- first_block_word;
01104                 if( out_buff)
01105                 {
01106                         memcpy( out_buff, p_data->m_queue+ p_data->m_queue_ini, first_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01107                         memcpy( out_buff+ first_block_word, p_data->m_queue, second_block_word* sizeof(UINT32));
01108                 }
01109                 p_data->m_queue_ini= second_block_word;
01110         }
01111         return TRUE;
01112 }
01113 
01115 // 
01117 long cvt_V1190_get_queue_free( cvt_V1190_data* p_data)
01118 {
01119         return (long)CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD- (( p_data->m_queue_end- p_data->m_queue_ini+ CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)%CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD);
01120 }
01121 
01123 // 
01125 long cvt_V1190_get_queue_length( cvt_V1190_data* p_data)
01126 {
01127         return (long)(( p_data->m_queue_end- p_data->m_queue_ini+ CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD)%CVT_V1190_QUEUE_SIZE_DWORD);
01128 }
01129 
01131 //
01133 BOOL cvt_V1190_set_MCST_CBLT( cvt_V1190_data* p_data, UINT8 address, MCST_CBLT_board_pos pos)
01134 {
01135         UINT16 reg_value;
01136         //
01137         // MCST/CBLT address
01138         reg_value= address;
01139         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MCST_CBLT_ADDRESS_INDEX, &reg_value))
01140         {
01141                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_MCST_CBLT_ADDRESS write failed !\n");
01142                 return FALSE;
01143         }
01144         //
01145         // MCST/CBLT control
01146         switch( pos)
01147         {
01148         case MCST_CBLT_board_pos_first:
01149                 reg_value= CVT_V1190_MCCTRL_FIRST_BOARD_MSK;
01150                 break;
01151         case MCST_CBLT_board_pos_mid:
01152                 reg_value= CVT_V1190_MCCTRL_MID_BOARD_MSK;
01153                 break;
01154         case MCST_CBLT_board_pos_last:
01155                 reg_value= CVT_V1190_MCCTRL_LAST_BOARD_MSK;
01156                 break;
01157         case MCST_CBLT_board_disabled:
01158                 reg_value= CVT_V1190_MCCTRL_DISABLED_BOARD_MSK;
01159                 break;
01160         default:
01161                 TRACE1( "V1190 cvt_V1190_set_MCST_CBLT bad position indentifier '%d'!\n", pos);
01162                 return FALSE;
01163         }
01164         if( !cvt_write_reg( &p_data->m_common_data, CVT_V1190_MCST_CBLT_CTRL_INDEX, &reg_value))
01165         {
01166                 TRACE( "V1190 CVT_V1190_MCST_CBLT_CTRL write failed !\n");
01167                 return FALSE;
01168         }
01169 
01170         return TRUE;
01171 }
